clues.text: Britannica notes that this Russian ruler "had young lovers up to the time of her unexpected death...at...67"

A 1945 telegram from Churchill to Truman mentioned Soviet power & "the descent of" this "between us and everything to the eastward"

As Monica, Sanaa Lathan gives a movie its title when she tells Omar Epps, "All's fair in" this "& basketball, baby"

The sister of Pygmalion, Dido is the queen of this North African city & becomes Aeneas' lover
Sinon is a Greek who persuades the Trojans to take this object into their city as an offering to the goddess Minerva
This god calms the storm at sea that begins the epic, letting Aeneas get to dry land
Allecto is one of these goddesses of vengeance; her machinations get the Trojans into yet another war
Describing a whole order of mammals, this adjective is from the Latin for "flesh eating"

This leader & his first wife Evelyn were married from 1944 until she told him, it's the ANC or me!

"Jeopardy! " categories include Potpourri & this 10-letter synonym for "potpourri"

My birthday of July 22 is on the cusp of Cancer & this beastly sign--it means I have good memory, I seem to recall
The cusp of Cancer & this sign is known as the Cusp of Magic &, after all, the best magic tricks are done with twins
November has the Cusp of Revolution; this woman who revolutionized tennis with "The Battle of the sexes" was born on Nov. 22
These 2 signs meet in September during the Cusp of Beauty

The eyes of most land snails are found atop the pairs of long stalks called these, like the limbs of a cephalopod
Snails are eaten in many countries, including as this Provençal-named delicacy in French cuisine
Snails make up part of the more than 45,000 species in this class of animals that has a name meaning "stomach foot"
Be careful around the aquatic cone snail; it produces these "nerve poisons" that can be venomous to humans
Tasmania produces around 25% of the world's wild caught supply of this large edible sea snail, mainly the black lip variety

rounds.text: An aria from this opera says, "Put on your costume & apply make-up to your face. The people pay & they want to laugh"
